translations.translation: The configuration of your load balancing IP must be applied explicitly in each of the datacentres. Only at this point will they be visible to your visitors. This will allow you to make a complex change to the configuration in one go.
An error has occurred recovering information on the load balancing IP: {{message}}
The load balancing IP is currently being configured.
An error occurred applying the configuration of the load balancing IP: {{message}}
Your load balancing IP configuration has not been applied in all datacentres.
